title: Newly Renovated Harvard Square One Bedroom!
map_address: John F. Kennedy St. near Mount Auburn
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 303489984', 'Rent: $2,500 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Just renovated!', 'Beautiful one bedroom in the heart of Harvard Square with hardwood floors throughout.', '-Newly renovated', '-Loads of natural light', '-Laundry in basement', '-Rent includes heat and hot water!', '-No security deposit!', 'Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!', 'Encore Realty', 'Share your search criteria with me here:', '<URL>', 'The information in this listing may have been gathered from third party sources including the owner and public records.', 'Listings are subject to errors and omissions.', 'Encore Realty disclaims any and all representations or warranties as to the accuracy of this information.', 'Encore Realty is an Equal Housing Opportunity Agency.', 'Photos may not always be of the actual apartment, at times sample images are used to make a general representation.']
